entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%

Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
